creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: tall geometric vase with vertical silver metallic and black stripes on two sides; two other sides are plain black; narrower mouth at top in the shape of a parallelogram; bottom is wider and is the shape of a rectangle; sides at top and bottom have triangle shapes; tall natural wood box with lid, marigold color cloth wrap, brown tie for box
inscription: lid verso: 黒釉銀ストライプ　花瓶; signed 浩瀬戸浩 and red seal 浩
markings: impressed makers mark at bottom center; paper tag adhered to bottom with red ink seal; red ink seal on cloth wrap
medium: Stoneware with black glaze, silver overglaze
title: Flower vase with silver stripes over black glaze
